meanings.definition: A high-performance motorcycle designed for racing or high-speed riding.
meanings.sent1: The superbikes zoomed around the track at incredible speeds.
meanings.sent2: He dreams of owning a superbike one day and racing with it.
meanings.sent3: The superbikes lined up at the starting line, ready to show off their speed.
meanings.sent4: Her love for superbikes was like a burning passion that fueled her adrenaline.
meanings.sent5: The roar of the superbikes echoed through the valley, a symphony of power.

meanings.definition: The act of riding or racing on a superbike.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the thrill of superbike racing on weekends.
meanings.sent2: Superbike enthusiasts gathered to watch the exciting races.
meanings.sent3: The superbikes raced past, leaving a trail of excitement in their wake.
meanings.sent4: In the world of superbike racing, every second counts in the race to the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The adrenaline rush of riding superbikes was addictive, keeping him coming back for more.
